pages.text: $(b)Advanced Alchemists$() can multiply precious ores through transmutation:$(br2)$(violet)Diamond Multiplication:$()$(br)Diamond Ore + Alchemical Catalyst + 8 Charcoal = $(l)8 Diamonds$()$(br2)$(violet)Gold from Iron:$()$(br)Deepslate Gold Ore + Alchemical Catalyst + 8 Raw Iron = $(l)8 Raw Gold$()

pages.title: More Transmutations
pages.text: $(violet)Iron from Copper:$()$(br)Deepslate Iron Ore + Alchemical Catalyst + 8 Raw Copper = $(l)8 Raw Iron$()$(br2)$(violet)Ore Conversion:$()$(br)Deepslate Diamond Ore + Alchemical Catalyst + Stone = Diamond Ore (easier to mine)$(br2)$(violet)Gilded Blackstone:$()$(br)Iron Nugget + Gilded Blackstone = Gold Nugget
